duties_responsibilities.duty: Participate in API development and integrations using MuleSoft within a Scrum team.
Lead API development and integrations, mentor junior team members, and work closely with architects on integration solutions.
Design APIs following RESTful API design principles and API-led architecture, and ensure the reusability of all developed components.
Define and measure key performance indicators to track and monitor API consumptions by App developers and API products.
Establish a culture of security awareness and ownership, and ensure the API architecture enables best-in-class user experience and response time.
Develop, execute, and measure risk management plans/processes and implement agile ways of working, member centricity, and digital & data literacy.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or equivalent (Master's preferred)
